chapters.title: Chapter 8: Sea Folk and Kin
chapters.info: Mistress of Novices, p. 199 (223)—The Aes Sedai who is in charge of training novices in the White Tower. The post was held by Sheriam Bayanar of the Blue Ajah until a coup that deposed Siuan Sanche chased her out of the Tower. The post is now held by Silviana Brehon in Tar Valon and Tiana Noselle among the Aes Sedai who fled to Salidar. See also Bagand, Sereille.
